preqs: Students must have their proposed project and supervisor approved by the unit coordinator prior to enrolment. In addition, students must have at least a distinction average across 24 points of second level units, including a minimum of 12 points from BMS2011, BMS2042, GEN2041, GEN2052, MCB2011, MCB2022, MOL2011, or MOL2022.

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {GEN2041, GEN2052, MOL2011, MOL2022} with grade of at least {STANDARD.D} AND  Must have passed 24 (I/W) credit points at levels {2} from units owned by {50000974})
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {SCI3739, SCI3740, SCI3990}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {SCI3739, SCI3740, SCI3990}

(Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {BMS2011, BMS2042, GEN2041, GEN2052, MCB2011, MCB2022, MOL2011, MOL2022} with grade of at least {STANDARD.D} AND  Must have passed 24 (I/W) credit points at levels {2} from units owned by {50000974})

description: This unit provides the opportunity for high-achieving students to undertake an individual research project in Genetics with an academic supervisor. It includes a critical literature review, experimental design and data analysis. The student must maintain regular contact with supervisor(s) and subject coordinator.
